name: Lauki Ka Halwa Recipe | Rida Aftab | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Lauki Ka Halwa Recipe: Bottle Gourd 2 kg Khoya ½ kg Dry Milk Powder 1 cup Cardamoms 6 Dessicated coconut 50 gms Almonds, Pistachios 100 gms Sugar 250 gms Ghee 250 gms Green Food Color ½ tsp
instructions: Boil bottle gourd. In a pan, heat ghee add cardamoms. When aroma comes add boiled bottle gourd and fry well. Now add in 1 cup of water dissolve dry milk. Add sugar in bottle gourd. After this, add milk, green food color, dessicated coconut, and fry. In the end, add khoya, almonds,pistachios and serve it.
